name: PRE:ONE
description: PRE:ONE is the FPS Adventure game that is set in the Far future. The machines wondered about the world outside so they sent a team of explorers into the world. Are you prepared to explore the new world?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit) Processor: Intel Core i3 3.0GHZ Processors Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 460 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 5 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 (64bit) Processor: Intel Core i5 7400 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia Geforce 1050ti DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 5 GB available space
